data.name: Atelier Sophie 2 - Atelier Series Legacy BGM Pack
data.detailed_description:
A collection of nostalgic Atelier tracks for BGM!

A set of more than a 1000 BGM tracks from older Atelier titles, starting with "Atelier Marie: The Alchemist of Salburg" and up to "Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout".

Note: In-game BGM can be changed from the desk at the atelier.
Please visit the official website for more information.
data.about_the_game:
A collection of nostalgic Atelier tracks for BGM!

A set of more than a 1000 BGM tracks from older Atelier titles, starting with "Atelier Marie: The Alchemist of Salburg" and up to "Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout".

Note: In-game BGM can be changed from the desk at the atelier.
Please visit the official website for more information.
data.short_description: A collection of nostalgic Atelier tracks for BGM! A set of more than a 1000 BGM tracks from older Atelier titles, starting with "Atelier Marie: The Alchemist of Salburg" and up to "Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout".

fullgame.name: Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream

data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600 or over, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or over, AMD Radeon RX 560 or over, 1280x720
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700 or over, AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or over
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or over, AMD Radeon RX 580 or over, 1920x1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
